title: The Amida Tree
description: Gordon Korman on The Amida Tree “…This piece works so well… There’s beauty in the simplicity of its telling, and the communication between the woman and the tree is hauntingly believable.” The Amida Tree is this generation's tree. It will appeal to parents interested in a sustainable environment, healthy emotional bonds, a balanced life, and ethical living. 2016 Mom's Choice Award- Silver Medal.2015 Gittle Award winner, third place.2013 Preditors and Editors Reader's Poll: Second Place Year's Best Children's Book.Hear the author read the entire book on Youtube.https://youtu.be/-76P__LaGj4
author: Bonnie Ferrante
